description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7d05h","text":"Indirect Proximity Ligation Assay (PLA) is a powerful molecular technique used to detect and visualize protein-protein interactions, protein modifications, and protein complex formations within cells or tissues. This method is based on the principles of proximity-dependent ligation and utilizes specific antibodies to detect the nitration of proteins on free-floating brain sections. Here we describe the PLA protocol that we routinely use in our laboratory to detect nitrated alpha-synuclein and nitration of mitochondrial enzymes such as SOD2 and the mitochondrial complex 1 subunit NDUFB8.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g2l0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85dpn","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1mrdm","text":"Pick 35um cut brain sections and transfer them to   Eppendorf tubes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eam1u","text":"Note: all incubation and wash steps are performed by shaking Eppendorf tubes at 250rpm (e.g., thermomixer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cko2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"BF2254F0313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkvtr","text":"Antigen-retrieval with citrate buffer (+tween, pH = 6) at 95°C for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7kns7","text":"Note: Heat the solution to 95°C before adding on the samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60psd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mkd0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84ua1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"8780FFB0313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10v04","text":"Blocking: Incubate in Duolink Blocking Solution ( )at 37°C for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9uo40","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"DD32F290313711EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"EA7B4940313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cj6i2","text":"Primary Antibody Incubation: Dilute antibodies in Duolink Antibody Diluent ( ) and incubate   room temperature.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":76,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3unrr","text":"for nitrated alpha-synuclein: mouse anti-3-NT and rabbit anti-h-alpha-synuclein","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cpec","text":"for nitrated SOD2:  mouse anti-3-NT and rabbit anti-SOD2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gcvk","text":"for nitrated NDUFB8:   mouse anti-3-NT and rabbit anti-NDUFB8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j7v","text":"see materials for dilutions and catalog numbers ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31},{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b30c","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"971B23B0313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"9ED6D090313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87i2b","text":"PLA probe incubation:\nPrepare anti-mouse MINUS and anti-rabbit PLUS probes following manufacturer's instructions, add solution on sections and incubate at 37°C for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":164,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6c7dk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"EFC49690313511EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3fuoc","text":"Ligation: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfblg","text":"Dilute the Duolink Ligation Buffer 1:5 in high-purity water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82nct","text":"Add the ligase (diluted 1:40) just before incubation (keep cold on freezer block!)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34u3t","text":"add the ligation solution on sections and incubate at 37°C for  \n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b4u7s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":4500,"guid":"09F01CB0313611EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5sdu9","text":"Amplification: This step is light-sensitive! incubation is performed using aluminum foil to protect samples from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2tjk","text":"Dilute the Duolink Amplification Buffer (red) 1:5 in high-purity water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0j7e","text":"Add the polymerase (diluted 1:80) just before incubation (keep cold on freezer block!)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnbr","text":"Add the amplification solution to the sections and incubate at 37°C for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dsu5c","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":9000,"guid":"16F2A5E0313611EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhfru","text":"Wash 2x  with wash buffer B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bqdus","text":"Wash 1x  with wash 0.1x buffer B","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"647E7C30313611EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"AB582660313611EEAF761522229A0D4E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9brmu","text":"Additional immunohistochemical staining (optional): if immunohistochemical counter-staining is going to be performed it is important to avoid the use of detergents in wash buffers and perform long incubations in cold. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"55k69","text":"Mount the samples on slides and let them air-dry for 5 mins\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c3k9v","text":"Coverslip samples with Duolink In Situ Mounting Medium with DAPI, store samples in the dark at 4°C \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":31,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Indirect Proximity Ligation Assay (PLA) - Fluoresence
